description: Difference between pi(10^n) and the integer nearest to 10^n / log(10^n).
references: John H. Conway and R. K. Guy, "The Book of Numbers," Copernicus, an imprint of Springer-Verlag, NY, 1995, Page 146.
formula: a(n)=round[A006880(n)-A057834(n)] - _Henry Bottomley_, Aug 10 2005a(n) ~ 10^n/(n log 10)^2. - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Mar 22 2015
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Nov 08 2000
extensions: Corrected and extended by _Henry Bottomley_, Aug 10 2005
a(22) to a(25) from _Vladimir Pletser_, Aug 10 2013
